title: Quests
description: All known quests and in-depth data.
subtitle: Here are all known quests in MH1 and MHG, including as much data on rewards and monster health as I could find. All visible event quests are the active ones on the Old-School server; some were originally only available in the international release of the game.
head: <link rel='stylesheet' href='css/quests.css'/>

quests.name: Basics: Finding Raw Meat
quests.details: First, a little trial. Hunt down an Aptonoth and harvest the meat. Deliver 2 pieces of Raw Meat and you'll complete your first quest!

quests.name: Basics: Preparing Meat
quests.details: You can't eat Raw Meat! You've got to cook it first! I want you to barbecue some meat and bring a piece back to the camp!

quests.name: Basics: Searching for Items
quests.details: You can find all sorts of useful items during a hunt. Search around and bring me 2 Herbs and 1 Spiderweb!

quests.name: Basics: Combining Items
quests.details: You can combine items to make new ones! Start with the basics: a Potion! You'll need a Blue Mushroom, and... Oh, what was the other...?

quests.name: Basics: Fishing
quests.details: You can use the fish you catch in all sorts of ways! Catch a Health-restoring Sushifish and bring it back to camp!

quests.name: Your First Monster Hunt!
quests.details: HELP! The children are being attacked by small, blue monsters called Velociprey! 3 of the beasts are outside! Do something!

quests.name: Mushroom Picking
quests.details: I want to send some Special Mushrooms to my brother in town. But there are too many monsters. Please bring 7 Special Mushrooms to me.

quests.name: Present for the Armorer
quests.details: The decorations on Bowguns have always been made from the horns of Kelbi. But we're running out! Can you bring 5 Kelbi Horns to me?

quests.name: Help for the Festival
quests.details: I'm cooking for a big festival in the town. But I'm running low on Well-Done Steaks. Can you bring me 5?

quests.name: Raid the Wyvern's Nest
quests.details: One of the village people has fallen ill. I need a Wyvern Egg to cure them. Please sneak into a nest and get an egg for me!

quests.name: The Formidable Velocidrome!
quests.details: After you killed those Velociprey, their leader showed up! It's bigger, and it has an orange crest. Find it and kill it!

quests.name: The Mushroom Hunt!
quests.details: I finally made it! I have traveled long and far to find rare mushrooms. I need 10 Special Mushrooms for my research. Please find them!

quests.name: Wyvern Egg Acquisition!
quests.details: I travel the world for new tastes and flavors. Now I want to try the egg of a wyvern. Please bring me 1 Wyvern Egg!

quests.name: Find the Wyvern Eggs!
quests.details: One of the village people has fallen ill. With 2 Wyvern Eggs I could make a remedy. Please get me 2 eggs from a wyvern's nest!

quests.name: Liver of Legend!
quests.details: I deal in rare items that I find in the desert. I've got a buyer for Water Wyvern and Sand Wyvern livers. Deliver 3 livers to me!

quests.name: Trouble in the Forest
quests.details: Those boar-monsters, the Bullfango, have been a lot of trouble lately. Can you thin the herd by 10 head? Much obliged.

quests.name: Velocidrome Redux!
quests.details: Another Velocidrome has shown up. Please take care of it for me. Wyverns have also been sighted nearby, so be very careful.

quests.name: Slay the Velociprey!
quests.details: A pack of 10 Velociprey have been preying on my cows! They're too much for me to handle. Please get rid of them for me!

quests.name: Jungle Menace
quests.details: My village is under attack by a large-eared, bird-like monster. I hear that it's sensitive to noise. Please slay it for us!

quests.name: Slay the Yian Kut-Ku!
quests.details: A bird-like Yian Kut-Ku is attacking people all over the place! Show me what you're made of by taking it out!

quests.name: The Land Shark
quests.details: Our pack-animals were eaten by something in the desert. But nobody actually saw the monsters attack! Find and slay the alpha monster!

quests.name: Mushroom Delivery!
quests.details: I have a dog and his favorite food are mushrooms. I want you to look for 10 of those “Special Mushrooms”. Yeah, for my cute dog!
quests.note: {only JP}, only offline quest with Gypceros in JP ver

quests.name: Bring Me Eggs!
quests.details: I search the world for new tastes and flavors. Now I want to try Apceros eggs. Let's start with 3. Thanks in advance!

quests.name: Find the Wyvern Eggs!
quests.details: One of the village people has fallen ill. With 2 Wyvern Eggs I could make a remedy. Please get me 2 eggs from a wyvern's nest!

quests.name: Attack of the Giant Bugs!
quests.details: My village is under attack by a swarm of 30 bug monsters. Please help! They're weak individually, but formidable in a group!
quests.note: [JP: Hornetaur Wing reward instead of Vespoid Shell]

quests.name: Slay the Velociprey Pack!
quests.details: I had you kill those 10 Velociprey, but now they're back! There's 20 of them this time. Please take care of it for me, hunter!

quests.name: Velocidrome Redux!
quests.details: Another Velocidrome has shown up. Please take care of it for me. Wyverns have also been sighted nearby, so be very careful.

quests.name: Slay the Genprey!
quests.details: I've been seeing a lot of Genprey these days. They're just waiting to attack us. It's a pack of 20. Hunt them down!|[US:]Requestor: Injured Soldier I'm too injured to go on. I'd like you to find and kill 20 Genprey in the swamp for me. Watch out, they can paralyze you...!

quests.name: Slay the Genprey!
quests.details: I've been seeing a lot of Genprey these days. They're just waiting to attack us. It's a pack of 20. Hunt them down!|[US:]Requestor: Injured Soldier I'm too injured to go on. I'd like you to find and kill 20 Genprey in the swamp for me. Watch out, they can paralyze you...!

quests.name: Slay the Gendrome!
quests.details: My caravans are being hit by Genprey. 2 Gendrome are leading the pack. Kill them and make the roads safe again for all!

quests.name: Slay the Gendrome!
quests.details: My caravans are being hit by Genprey. 2 Gendrome are leading the pack. Kill them and make the roads safe again for all!

quests.name: Ioprey Hunting
quests.details: We encountered a huge Ioprey nest in a deep tunnel! We can't continue working unless you kill 20 of them for us!

quests.name: Poisonous Fangs
quests.details: Iopreys are carnivorous red monsters with poison fangs. They repeatedly attacked the village as a pack. If you can defeat the two alpha monsters, we will be able to handle the pack.

quests.name: Slay the Gypceros!
quests.details: I saw a gigantic bird-like monster deep in the swamp! I can't do business with a thing like that in there! Please find it and kill it!

quests.name: Catch a Yian Kut-Ku
quests.details: I would like you to find and capture a Yian Kut-Ku alive. I suggest using a Pitfall Trap. Good luck, and thanks in advance!

quests.name: Giant Bug Attack!
quests.details: My farm has been ruined by huge insects! They roam the jungle area and attack with a swarm of 30. Get rid of them!

quests.name: The Velociprey Pack
quests.details: I had you kill those 15 Velociprey, but now they’re back! There’s 20 of them this time. Please take care of it for me, hunter!

quests.name: Attack of the Rathalos
quests.details: It cannot be... But.. My entire warband was wiped out by a wyvern. Now all rests upon your shoulders, monster hunter! Slay it!

quests.name: Deliver Three Wyvern Eggs
quests.details: I travel the world for new tastes and flavors. Now I want to try the egg of a wyvern. Please bring me 3 Wyvern Eggs!

quests.name: The Genprey Pack
quests.details: Recently I saw Genpreys alot. I think their pack will attack us soon. Kill 20 of them before they attack us! Please!

quests.name: Velocidrome Eradication!
quests.details: What?! The boss of the Velociprey pack seems to have returned again! And now there are three! Since the flying dragon was also sighted, please be careful when fighting!

quests.name: Gendrome Redux!
quests.details: A pack of monsters led by 3 Gendrome is causing trouble for us. Please hunt down and slay the 3 Gendrome.

quests.name: Fang of the Iodrome!
quests.details: My village is under attack by a pack of Ioprey. The pack is led by 3 alpha monsters. Slay the poison- filled creatures for us!

quests.name: Basarios: Unseen Peril
quests.details: A wyvern attacked my expedition from out of the blue in the volcanic zone. Where did it come from? Please slay it!

quests.name: Basarios: Unseen Peril
quests.details: A wyvern attacked my expedition from out of the blue in the volcanic zone. Where did it come from? Please slay it!

quests.name: Water Wyvern in the Desert
quests.details: I found a giant Water Wyvern in a cave in the desert! I can't defeat it because it stays underwater. Slay it and the credit's yours!

quests.name: Queen of the Desert
quests.details: I have traveled far to find a hunter capable of ridding my lands of a troublesome wyvern. Please defeat the Rathian for us.

quests.name: Slay the Rathian!
quests.details: The monsters in the swamp zone are out of control, the Rathian in particular. I want you to hunt one down. Casualties are spiraling!

quests.name: Catch a Rathalos
quests.details: I'm keeping that wyvern as a pet! So hands off! Now I want a male wyvern. And I want it ALIVE. OK?
quests.note: rewards Rathalos Wing with low percentage

quests.name: Horn of the Monoblos
quests.details: Rumor has it the hunters here are among the best. A Monoblos has laid our soldiers low. Now we need your help. Slay it for us!

quests.name: The Shadow in the Cave
quests.details: A child is lost in the caves. We want to rescue him, but a gray wyvern is in the area... Please slay the beast!

quests.name: The Runaway Diablos
quests.details: A giant wyvern smashed the border-wall and ran into this area. We need to find and kill it before it causes any more trouble!

quests.name: Terror of the Gravios
quests.details: A fearsome Gravios has appeared amidst the magma and desolation of the volcanic zone. Slay the firebreather for us!

quests.name: Handle With Care!
quests.details: We need large amounts of explosive to make Bowgun ammo. I want you to bring 1 Powderstone here to me. And be careful about it!
quests.prerequisites: Clear “The Terror of Gravios”, “The Runaway Diablos”, and “The Shadow in the Cave”.

quests.name: A Troublesome Pair
quests.details: My, how you've become a fine hunter! I have a job for you. I want you to hunt down a pair of wyverns, a Rathalos and a Rathian.
quests.note: [EU/US: Rathalos Plate, Rathian Plate, Speartuna], best offline quest to get Rathalos Wing

quests.name: It's Party Time!
quests.details: We're throwing a party at his lordship's home, but didn't order enough food! Can you bring us 10 pieces of Raw Meat right away?

quests.name: Show me your Cooking Skills!
quests.details: Our expedition got lost. I made it out, but the team is totally out of supplies! Please deliver 15 Well-Done Steaks for them!

quests.name: Mushroom Picking
quests.details: The Special Mushrooms around here sell for a fortune down south! I'd like you to pick 15 of them from the forest. I pay well. Whaddya say?

quests.name: The Mushroom Hunt!
quests.details: My doggie just looooves Special Mushrooms! I'd like you to bring me 20 of them. Please don't disappoint my precious little doggie!

quests.name: The Sculptor's Errand
quests.details: I make art using monster tusks and horns. Can you get me 12 Kelbi Horns? They're those deer-like monsters in the forest.

quests.name: Panning for Goldenfish
quests.details: I'd do anything to get my hands on some legendary Goldenfish! I'm begging you to bring me 5 of them! Please!

quests.name: Crystal Hunting!
quests.details: I heard a rumor that a vein of Sootstone has been discovered. To confirm it, I want you to obtain 3 pieces of Sootstone Ore.

quests.name: The Lady Gourmet
quests.details: I travel the world for new tastes and flavors. Now I want to try the liver of a Piscine Wyvern. Please bring me 10 of these livers!

quests.name: Attack of the Giant Bugs
quests.details: My plantation's under attack by giant bugs! They nest in the jungle, in a swarm of about 50. Take care of them for me!
quests.note: [{percent: 4,name: Vespoid Shell,quantity: 1},{percent: 4,name: Vespoid Wing,quantity: 1},{percent: 12,name: Monster Fluid,quantity: 1},{percent: 5,name: Thunderbug,quantity: 1},{percent: 2,name: Monster Fluid,quantity: 2},{percent: 1,name: Thunderbug,quantity: 2}]

quests.name: Velociprey Hunt
quests.details: There's a group of 20 or so Velociprey in the forest attacking travelers. I want you to hunt them down and get rid of them.

quests.name: The Velociprey Lords
quests.details: There are 3 alpha Velociprey that seem to be guiding the rest. They're too large for us to handle. Can you get rid of them?

quests.name: Jungle Menace
quests.details: I want you to hunt and kill the giant bird-like monster that has appeared in our jungle. It's wreaking havoc on our environment!

quests.name: Attack of the Yian Kut-Ku
quests.details: That Yian Kut-Ku really made mincemeat out of me! It's out of my league, so I want you to hunt it down for me!

quests.name: Slay the Gypceros!
quests.details: I saw a gigantic bird-like monster deep in the jungle! I can't do business with a thing like that in there! Please find it and kill it!

quests.name: More Coal Please
quests.details: We need Coal to power our spear cannon. It can be found in the jungle. The more fuel the better, so please bring us 15 pieces!

quests.name: Re-Supply the Dragonator
quests.details: We have installed a steam- powered spear cannon to repel monsters, but we need Coal to power it! Please bring us 15 pieces of it.

quests.name: Get me Sootstone Ore!
quests.details: I never get sick of gems! I hear that Sootstone Ore can be found around here. Bring 3 pieces of it to me for a hefty reward.

quests.name: Raid the Wyvern's Nest
quests.details: Ever eaten a Wyvern Egg? They're a delicacy only found inside wyvern nests. Bring me 3 of the eggs, and I'll pay you handsomely.

quests.name: Apceros Egg Hunt
quests.details: I am studying the ecology of the Apceros. I need 3 eggs for my research, but I am too weak to get them! Can you bring them to me?

quests.name: Trouble in the Swamp
quests.details: The swamp animals have been unruly lately, especially the Bullfango. I've been asked to hunt down 15 of them. Can you help me out?

quests.name: Slay the Genprey!
quests.details: I'm too injured to go on. I'd like you to find and kill 20 Genprey in the desert for me. Watch out, they can paralyze you...!

quests.name: Slay the Gendrome!
quests.details: My caravans are being hit by Genprey. 3 Gendrome are leading the pack. Kill them and make the roads safe again for all!

quests.name: Leaders of the Genprey
quests.details: 3 Gendrome and their pack have long been menacing this area. Please destroy the Gendrome to disperse the pack for us!

quests.name: The Land Shark
quests.details: A villager was tracking a pack of monsters, but lost sight of them in the desert. Please find the leader of the pack and kill it for us.

quests.name: Gypceros in the Swamp
quests.details: I thought I was doing well against that creature in the swamp zone, but it was just playing dead! Hunt it down for me!

quests.name: Gypceros: Venomous Terror
quests.details: The fields all around the town are getting torn to shreds by a gigantic bird- like monster with poison. Exterminate it for us!

quests.name: Basarios: Unseen Peril
quests.details: The area was totally barren, but then I was attacked out of the blue! It had to have been a wyvern. Slay it for me!

quests.name: Attack of the Rathian
quests.details: My caravan was wiped out by a she-wyvern. I'll pay you whatever you ask to destroy the foul creature! You are our last hope!

quests.name: Queen of the Desert
quests.details: A fire-breathing she-wyvern I was chasing nearly burned me to a crisp in the desert! Please hunt this Rathian down and kill it!

quests.name: Slay the Rathalos!
quests.details: I request the assistance of any and all hunters to find and destroy the Rathalos that has appeared near here. Reward offered.

quests.name: Wyvern Egg Hunt
quests.details: Ever eaten a Wyvern Egg? I made a dish with them, and it was a big hit with everyone! I'd like you to deliver 3 of the eggs!

quests.name: Bring us Powderstone!
quests.details: We have a Great Cannon here for wyverns, but we need Powderstone to make ammo for it. Please deliver 3 Powderstones.

quests.name: Ioprey Hunting
quests.details: We encountered a huge Ioprey nest in a deep tunnel! We can't continue working unless you kill 20 of them for us!

quests.name: Slay the Iodrome!
quests.details: A pack of monsters headed by 3 Iodrome is causing trouble around here. Can you defeat the Iodrome to help us out?

quests.name: Leaders of the Ioprey
quests.details: I've been fighting Iodrome, but I had to retreat with just 3 of them left! The credit's yours if you can take them out for me.

quests.name: The Land Shark
quests.details: A villager was tracking a pack of monsters, but lost sight of them in the desert. Please find the leader of the pack and kill it for us.

quests.name: Basarios: Invisible Terror
quests.details: The area was totally barren, but then I was attacked out of the blue! It had to have been a wyvern. Slay it for me!

quests.name: Queen of the Jungle
quests.details: I have traveled far to find a hunter capable of ridding my lands of a troublesome wyvern. Please defeat the Rathian for us.

quests.name: Slay the Rathian!
quests.details: The monsters in the swamp zone are out of control, the Rathian in particular. I want you to hunt one down. Casualties are spiraling!

quests.name: The Shadow in the Cave
quests.details: We were exploring a cave near here, but stumbled on this disgusting blob-like monster! Get rid of it and save our research!

quests.name: Wyvern in the Darkness
quests.details: Long have my people spoken of a wyvern in the cave in the jungle, capable of attacking with electricity. Please destroy it for us!

quests.name: Water Wyvern in the Jungle
quests.details: I found a water-dwelling wyvern in the jungle! I tried taking it out, but water's my weak spot. Can you hunt it down for me?

quests.name: The Runaway Diablos
quests.details: A giant wyvern smashed the border-wall and ran into this area. We need to find and kill it before it causes any more trouble!

quests.name: The Fearsome Gravios
quests.details: A heavily armored, heat- breathing wyvern has been seen in the swamp. Rid the area of it and I will reward you well.

quests.name: Volcanic Valor
quests.details: The volcano's activity has stirred up the monsters. Heavily armored wyverns have been attacking us. Can you help us out?

quests.name: Catch a Yian Kut-Ku
quests.details: I need a Yian Kut-Ku, and I'm selling it, so I need it alive. Believe me, I pay well. Need I say any more?

quests.name: Catch a Gypceros
quests.details: We are attempting to make a weapon from the poison of the Gypceros. As such, I would like you to capture one and bring it to me.

quests.name: Get me a Live Khezu!
quests.details: The monsters known as Khezu have some very unique properties. We need one alive for further research!

quests.name: Bring me a Plesioth!
quests.details: I've traveled the world in search of the delicacy known as Piscine Wyvern sushi! I simply MUST try it! Please bring one here alive!

quests.name: Catch a Rathalos
quests.details: I'm keeping that wyvern as a pet! So hands off! Now I want a male wyvern. And I want it ALIVE. OK?

quests.name: A Giant Dragon Invades!
quests.details: A giant dragon has attacked our fort! If it falls, so too do our lands! Use the fort's weaponry to put an end to the beast!
quests.note: Urgent quest that can only be completed once.

quests.name: It's Party Time!
quests.details: We're throwing a party at his lordship's home, but didn't order enough food! Can you bring us 10 pieces of Raw Meat right away?

quests.name: Show me your Cooking Skills!
quests.details: Our expedition got lost. I made it out, but the team is totally out of supplies! Please deliver 15 Well-Done Steaks for them!

quests.name: Mushroom Picking
quests.details: The Special Mushrooms around here sell for a fortune down south! I'd like you to pick 15 of them from the forest. I pay well. Whaddya say?

quests.name: The Mushroom Hunt!
quests.details: My doggie just looooves Special Mushrooms! I'd like you to bring me 20 of them. Please don't disappoint my precious little doggie!

quests.name: The Sculptor's Errand
quests.details: I make art using monster tusks and horns. Can you get me 12 Kelbi Horns? They're those deer-like monsters in the forest.

quests.name: Panning for Goldenfish
quests.details: I'd do anything to get my hands on some legendary Goldenfish! I'm begging you to bring me 5 of them! Please!

quests.name: Crystal Hunting!
quests.details: I heard a rumor that a vein of White Quartz has been discovered. To confirm it, I need 3 pieces of Quartz Ore.

quests.name: The Lady Gourmet
quests.details: I travel the world for new tastes and flavors. Now I want to try the liver of a Piscine Wyvern. Please bring me 10 of these livers!

quests.name: Attack of the Giant Bugs
quests.details: My plantation's under attack by giant bugs! They nest in the jungle, in a swarm of about 50. Take care of them for me!

quests.details: Ever eaten a Wyvern Egg? They're a delicacy only found inside wyvern nests. Bring me 3 of the eggs, and I'll pay you handsomely.

quests.details: My caravan was wiped out by a she-wyvern. I'll pay you whatever you ask to destroy the foul creature! You are our last hope!

quests.name: Queen of the Desert
quests.details: A fire-breathing she-wyvern I was chasing nearly burned me to a crisp in the desert! Please hunt this Rathian down and kill it!

quests.name: Four Horns
quests.details: I simply can't bear to think about the terror and pain those Diablos are causing my people. Hunt down 2 Diablos for me!

quests.name: Wyvern Egg Hunt
quests.details: Ever eaten a Wyvern Egg? I made a dish with them, and it was a big hit with everyone! I'd like you to deliver 3 of the eggs!

quests.name: Bring us Powderstone!
quests.details: We have a Great Cannon here for wyverns, but we need Powderstone to make ammo for it. Please deliver 3 Powderstones.

quests.name: Bring us Powderstone!
quests.details: Please bring us 3 Powderstones. We need them to make ammo for our Great Cannon. Then we'll teach those wyverns a few tricks!

quests.name: Ioprey Hunting
quests.details: We encountered a huge Ioprey nest in a deep tunnel! We can't continue working unless you kill 20 of them for us!

quests.name: Slay the Iodrome!

quests.name: Wyvern in the Darkness
quests.details: Long have my people spoken of a wyvern in the cave in the jungle, capable of attacking with electricity. Please destroy it for us!

quests.name: Water Wyvern in the Jungle
quests.details: I found a water-dwelling wyvern in the jungle! I tried taking it out, but water's my weak spot. Can you hunt it down for me?

quests.name: The Runaway Diablos
quests.details: A giant wyvern smashed the border-wall and ran into this area. We need to find and kill it before it causes any more trouble!

quests.name: The Fearsome Gravios
quests.details: A heavily armored, heat- breathing wyvern has been seen in the swamp. Rid the area of it and I will reward you well.

quests.name: Volcanic Valor
quests.details: The volcano's activity has stirred up the monsters. Heavily armored wyverns have been attacking us. Can you help us out?

quests.name: Two Rock Wyverns
quests.details: Our digging has all but stopped! Tough Rock Wyverns have taken over the mine! Please hunt down and kill 2 of them!

quests.name: A Troublesome Pair
quests.details: A Rathalos and Rathian have paired up and are ravaging my country! My father won't let me go, so please kill them for me!

quests.name: Wyverns of Land and Sky
quests.details: A pair of wyverns have been seen in the jungle zone. They may attack at any moment. Brave hunters, slay both of them for me!

quests.name: A Giant Dragon Invades!
quests.details: A giant dragon has attacked our fort again! Use the fort's weaponry to slay the beast and save our great nation!

quests.name: The Legendary Black Dragon (1)
quests.goal: Damage Fatalis as much as you can to drive him away
quests.details: With this money, we can repair the Ballista! I hear there is ammunition for it in the arsenal--put it to good use in your battle!

quests.name: The Legendary Black Dragon (2)
quests.goal: Damage Fatalis as much as you can to drive him away
quests.details: With this money we can rebuild the Castle Gate and crush the black dragon! Use both this and the Ballista in your battle!

quests.name: The Legendary Black Dragon (3)
quests.goal: Damage Fatalis as much as you can to drive him away
quests.details: We have repaired the Great Cannon for use against the black dragon. Ammo is in the arsenal. Use it, the Castle Gate, and the Ballista!

quests.name: The Legendary Black Dragon (4)
quests.goal: Damage Fatalis as much as you can to drive him away
quests.details: Now we can repair the steam-driven Dragonator spear cannon. You have one shot, so aim well! And use our other weaponry as well!

quests.name: Forest Gathering
quests.details: Collect as much as you can, if you collect field material, you can clear the quest by delivering Map in the box.

quests.name: Jungle Gather
quests.details: Collect as much as you can, if you collect field material, you can clear the quest by delivering Map in the box.

quests.name: Desert Gather
quests.details: Collect as much as you can, if you collect field material, you can clear the quest by delivering Map in the box.

quests.name: Swamp Gather
quests.details: Collect as much as you can, if you collect field material, you can clear the quest by delivering Map in the box.

quests.name: Volcano Gathering
quests.details: Collect as much as you can, if you collect field material, you can clear the quest by delivering Map in the box.

quests.name: [BBQ2]
quests.goal: How many steaks can you make before the timer runs out?

quests.name: The BBQ Festival!
quests.goal: How many steaks can you make before the timer runs out?
quests.details: It's barbecue party time! Here's the deal: BBQ as many Well-Done Steaks as you can within the time limit! I'll pay ya for each! Notes: After completing player will be awarded a Gourmet BBQ &/or a Kingmeat. This Quests reward was bugged and wouldn't give you more Zenny based on how many Well-Done Steaks you would deliver, splitting the low reward to the players instead.

quests.name: Velociprey Hunting!
quests.client: Requestor: Guild Boss The battle royale is about to begin! Can you hunt down 30 Velociprey and make it back alive? Slip up once and it's QUEST OVER!

quests.name: Felyne Hunting!
quests.details: The battle royale is about to begin! Can you hunt down 50 Felyne and make it back alive? Slip up once and it's QUEST OVER! Notes: After completing player will be awarded a Pawprint Stamp.

quests.name: Capture a Yian Kut-Ku!
quests.details: Prove your skill and team- work by capturing a Kut-Ku. The time limit is just 5 minutes, and you only have one chance. Don't blow it!

quests.name: Capture a Khezu!
quests.details: Prove your skill and team- work by capturing a Khezu. The time limit is just 10 minutes, and you only have one chance. Don't blow it!

quests.name: The GMR Heavy Metal Crusade
quests.details: Level the field with the Holy Grail of Heavy Metal. Only those with hearts of steel will walk away with The GMR Chrome Heart. (Actually the King Meat quest.)

quests.name: On the Trail of the Beast!
quests.details: I saw it, I swear! Like a ghost, faintly glowing... Riches await the one who slays it, but you only get one chance. Don't blow it!

quests.name: The Legendary Kirin
quests.details: I saw a phantom beast that glowed with a dim light... Riches await the one who slays it, but you only have one chance. Don't blow it!

quests.name: Repel the Giant Dragon!
quests.details: Lao-Shan Lung is attacking the fort! Use every weapon we've got and stop this monster. This is your one and only chance. Good luck! Notes: In-Game this event was called “Repel the Giant!” omitting the word dragon. Also, the Goal Condition was to slay Lao, not repel yet repelling it cleared the quest.

quests.name: Raid the Wyvern's Nest
quests.details: Ever eaten a Wyvern Egg? They're a delicacy only found inside wyvern nests. Bring me 3 of the eggs, and I'll pay you handsomely.
quests.supplies: Map x1, Map x1, Map x1, Map x1, Mini Whetstone x2, Mini Whetstone x2, First-aid Med. x3, First-aid Med. x3, First-aid Med. x3, First-aid Med. x3, Ration x2, Ration x2, Ration x2, Ration x2, Paintball x1, Paintball x1, Normal S Lv1 x1, Normal S Lv1 x1, Pellet S Lv1 x10, Recov S Lv1 x5, Huskberry x10

quests.name: Slay the Rathalos!
quests.details: The wyvern, that oversized flying lizard, has caused enough misery and torment. The order has finally come! Show the beast no mercy!
quests.supplies: Map x1, Map x1, Map x1, Map x1, Mini Whetstone x2, Mini Whetstone x2, First-aid Med. x3, First-aid Med. x3, First-aid Med. x3, First-aid Med. x3, Ration x2, Ration x2, Ration x2, Ration x2, Paintball x1, Paintball x1, Huskberry x10, Sm Barrel-Bomb x2, Large Barrel x1, Normal S Lv2 x10, Stun S Lv1 x5, Recov S Lv1 x5

quests.name: Take down Yian Kut-Ku!
quests.details: I want you to hunt and kill the giant bird-like monster that has appeared in our jungle. It's wreaking havoc on our environment!

quests.name: Take down Rathalos!
quests.details: It cannot be... But.. My entire warband was wiped out by a wyvern. Now all rests upon your shoulders, monster hunter! Slay it!

quests.note: (slot of urgent quest: Slay the Rathalos!)

quests.client: Client: Guild boss and his daughter Well, it is the beginning of battle royal! As soon as I've exhausted my power, I immediately fail. Can you survive a huge relic against a giant dragonfly, Gravimos? ?

rewards.name: Reward: Sleeping bag, flaming bag, oyster shell, proof of courage, pyrophorite, draglite ore, union ore, guild ticket, Nova crystal
報酬：睡眠袋、火炎袋、鎧竜の甲殻、勇気の証、紅蓮石、ドラグライト鉱石、ユニオン鉱石、ギルドチケット、ノヴァクリスタル
剥ぎ取りで睡眠袋、火炎袋、紅蓮石、鎧竜の甲殻、鎧竜の堅殻、鎧竜の頭、鎧竜の翼が入手可能

quests.name: The Terror of Gravios
quests.prerequisites: Appears if you own any piece of Cephalos armor

quests.name: Handle With Care!
quests.prerequisites: Clear “The Terror of Gravios”, “The Runaway Diablos”, and “The Shadow in the Cave“.

quests.name: The Runaway Diablos
quests.prerequisites: Appears if you own any piece of Monoblos armor
